description:
The 9th Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet that was formed sometime prior to 796 UC. That year, it was under the command of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch776 [Al Salem] during the Alliance invasion of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire].
It fought at the Battle of Alviss against the fleet of http://anidb.net/ch193 [Wolfgang Mittermeyer] and suffered over 50% casualties.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Dai 9 Kantai
